Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Can you provide more details regarding the error you're seeing, what you're doing when you see this error, and which version of Fabric/BYFN you're using?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Perhaps you ran into the same issue reported by FAB-10771. That user was performing commands in the latest documentation, which uses the --peerAddresses and --tlsRootCertFiles flags introduced in v1.2, but running them against Fabric v1.1 peers. When using v1.1 images, be sure to follow: https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.1/ , which is the documentation that loads by default when you go to https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/.
